front.title: IEEE Guide for Application for Monitoring Equipment to Liquid-Immersed Transformers and Components

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Identification of the key parameters that can be monitored for obtaining an indication of the condition of liquid-immersed transformers is covered by this guide. It also covers risk/benefit analysis, sensor application, and monitoring systems application. This guide does not cover interpretation of monitoring results.
